name: Hyperplane (Affax)
description:
WebGL with crash when reloading, but this will not delete any progress. (I cannot upload a fixed version) “Time waits for no one, so take control of time.”

Take control of time and clone yourself to achieve tasks impossible for one man. Your loyal bean clones will mimic all your past actions.

You are tasked with completing 10 tasks to win back your freedom!

The settings are found in the pause menu Controls:
  • Move: WASD
  • Reload: R
  • Rewind: H
  • Pause: Esc
Credits:
  • Textures: Lennart (cc0textures.com)
  • SFX: Kenney (kenney.nl)
  • Button SFX: Premiumbeat
  • Lights SFX: SoundEffectsArchive
  • BG Song: ThrillShowX
  • Ui Shapes Kit: ThisOtherThing
  • Everything Else: Me

I have permission to use all the mentioned assets, and so do you. All are copyright free or only disallow reselling.

Level 10 answer (Spoiler Inside):
